name: Steamed Parsleyed Cucumbers
keywords: coriander, cucumber, parsley, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Trim off the ends of the cucumbers and remove the skin. Cut the cucumbers into pieces 2 inches thick. Quarter each piece lengthwise and remove the seeds.
Place the cucumber pieces into a rack of a steamer over boiling water. Steam 2 minutes or until tender.
Heat the butter in a saucepan, and add the cucumber, parsley, coriander, cumin, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Toss and cook 30 seconds.
